titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the honourable Society of the Natives of the County of Kent November the 21th, 1700, at St. Mary-le-Bow, London / by William Assheton ...
titleStmt.author: Assheton, William, 1641-1711.

notesStmt.note: Half-title page reads: Dr. Assheton's sermon preached before the honourable Society of the County of Kent, November 21th, 1700.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
